snippet.title: CATASTIC MUSIC EXPERIENCE IN VIRTUAL REALITY! | Chocolate VR (Oculus Touch Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Today we will be dancing our way into Chocolate VR, a 3-4 minute music experience in where you can interact with the world around you through music.  This video clip will transform you into a robot and puts you in the middle of a cat-centric world of colorful chrome.  
 
This was a great little VR music experience. Not as fun as Old Friend but still worth a try. It’s just crazy to shoot rainbow kittens through the air on the beat of the music and also be able to see yourself as a robot is a really strange experience. I would definitely check this title out. In my opinion it’s a bit  too short for 2 bucks tho. So it’s up to you if you wanna get it. 

SteamVR: http://store.steampowered.com/app/575420/Chocolate/
Oculus Home: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1810750645607190/

► Did you like this video? Subscribe Nathie! http://goo.gl/3LPBS1
► You can also follow me on Twitter! http://www.twitter.com/nathieVR
► Or follow Nathie on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/nathie944

► My VR Rig

-CPU: Intel Core I7-6950X 
-GPU: GeForce GTX 1080 Asus STRIX
-PSU: Corsair CX 1200i 
-RAM: 32 GB DDR4
-Mob: X99 Deluxe 2
-Main SSD: Intel 750 Series 1,2 TB
-Case: Coolermaster Mastercase Maker 5

► About me

You are an admirer of Virtual Reality?  Same here! I'm reviewing all sorts of VR games with the Oculus Touch, HTC Vive and Playstation VR.
